error_context: The Windows test job failed because a unit test failed: ERROR: test_no_match in tornado/tornado/test/iostream_test.py (traceback shows the failure at line 1200). The test raised Exception("did not get expected log message") from tornado/tornado/testing.py (raised in __exit__, shown at line 758) after run_sync returned a future result (tornado/tornado/ioloop.py:539). The failing command was the Windows test step running: py -m tornado.test --fail-if-logs=false.

The logs also show runtime warnings (RuntimeWarning: coroutine ... was never awaited at tornado/tornado/platform/asyncio.py:462) and many ResourceWarning: unclosed <socket.socket ...> messages — these are visible in the logs but the immediate cause of the job failure is the test exception.

relevant_files.reason: Traceback frames reference this file (e.g. "File "D:\a\tornado\tornado\tornado\testing.py", line 102, in __call__" and later "File "D:\a\tornado\tornado\tornado\testing.py", line 758, in __exit__\n    raise Exception(\"did not get expected log message\")"). The raise in testing.py is the immediate source of the Exception.

The failing test is reported as "ERROR: test_no_match (tornado.test.iostream_test.TestIOStreamCheckHostname.test_no_match)" and the traceback shows "File "D:\a\tornado\tornado\tornado\test\iostream_test.py", line 1200, in test_no_match", linking this test file and line to the failure.

The traceback includes "File "D:\a\tornado\tornado\tornado\ioloop.py", line 539, in run_sync\n    return future_cell[0].result()", showing the test executed through ioloop.run_sync before the exception propagated.

Log shows a pending Task referencing this file: "task: <Task pending name='Task-1330' coro=... running at D:\a\tornado\tornado\tornado\platform\asyncio.py:462>" and a RuntimeWarning: "coroutine 'SelectorThread.__init__.<locals>.thread_manager_anext' was never awaited", tying this file/line to runtime warnings in the run.

error_types.subcategory: Exception in unit test (did not get expected log message)
error_types.evidence: "ERROR: test_no_match (tornado.test.iostream_test.TestIOStreamCheckHostname.test_no_match)" and the traceback showing "File ... iostream_test.py, line 1200, in test_no_match" followed by "Exception: did not get expected log message" (log lines around the failing test).

Log lines: "[E ... base_events:1785] Task was destroyed but it is pending!" and "RuntimeWarning: coroutine 'SelectorThread.__init__.<locals>.thread_manager_anext' was never awaited" with a frame at "...platform\asyncio.py:462".

Many repeated lines in the log show "ResourceWarning: unclosed <socket.socket fd=..., laddr=('127.0.0.1', ...), raddr=('127.0.0.1', ...)>", which are visible immediately before the job termination message.
